name: Golf Rival
description:
The newly-designed Golf Rival is a multiplayer online golf game where you can play 1v1 with global players online, or log in Facebook and challenge your friends

Golf Rival has realistic 3D visual effects and real physical effects, making you feel like you are on the scene of the game and you can experience the excitement of real games on your mobile phone!

Golf Rival is a rewarding game that is easy to start and hard to master. Play with golfers from all over the world!


（1）1v1 games and challenge your Facebook friends
（2） Thousands of online players live games
（3）Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike!
（4） Challenging golf lies from anywhere on the course including tee, fairway, rough, fescue, bunker, green
（5）Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
（6） Invite friends to compete in multiplayer games with live chat
（7） Leaderboards and achievements

Our games are undergoing limited-time testing. If there are any questions we wish to tell us, we will strive to create a better experience for everyone.

Contact US：harploue@gmail.com
